title: Executive Order 6056-Classification of Mr. G. Harold Keatley
content: G. Harold Keatley, of Pennsylvania, who, since April 4, 1929, has been serving in a position in the Department of State excepted from civil-service requirements, may be appointed in the classified service without compliance with civil-service rules.
This order is issued upon the recommendation of the Secretary of State.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 6056-Classification of Mr. G. Harold Keatley Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361606
